name: Chaos Frenzy
description:
Chaos Frenzy is a game based on "Arcane Rivals" https://itch.io/jam/betajam2/rate/120569 from ghostly feline, an awesome game that was made for the 2017 game jam, and also it's a fan game for a famous V-tuber called erispheria

In this adventure you will find that eris the Chaos goddess has lost her powers source: The chaos emeralds by an unknow being at the chaos dimension, and now she's got a goal to archive: Get back her powers and become the chaos goddess once again, but it wont be easy for her as emeralds have taken the form of her most deep dears, don't give up!

lore aside, this is a Megaman like game, as i said, totally based on ghostly feline "Arcane Rivals"; and yes, i asked him if i could use his code before and he told me yes since it's from a game jam╰(▔∀▔)╯also if by any chance you want to donate I will use it for savings in order to look out for a pixel artist to properly add more original sprites for the game, not just edits, re animates and recolors as i made all this out by myself <(￣︶￣)>.

Thanks for reading! friendly reminder: visit erispheria channel and ghostly feline twitter (ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧ https://www.twitch.tv/erispheria // https://twitter.com/AGhostlyFeline
